name: Glitch House
description:
Escape Glitch House by finding the key in each room. Combust your belongings by double clicking, use the arrow or WASD keys to move. 

Glitch House and it's original soundtrack was created by LUXI during the UE4 2018 Summer Game Jam based on the theme "Well that escalated quickly"...  // find more info and projects at wickedalley.com // download the soundtrack at luximusic.bandcamp.com // Gameplay is about 10 minutes long

Recommended Requirements

CPU: Core-i7 or an equivalent
RAM: 8 GB
OS: Windows 10
VIDEO CARD: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent with 4GBs of VRAM
FREE DISK SPACE: 1 GB
Directx:  Version 11

This project was created using:: 
-various meshes from the UE4 marketplace, such as the furniture and props
-artwork/decals made in photoshop
-a few additional meshes in blender
-original soundtrack created in ableton live during the four days
-outline material from a Tom Looman tutorial
